file_insights.changes: Updated spec from 017-1-2-create-equipmentapprovalsubmission-model to 049-create-consultant-assignment-ui, incremented completed subtasks from 7 to 12 (of 15 total), advanced phase from Testing and Verification to Integration and Data Flow, updated session number from 8 to 13
file_insights.significance: High - tracks project state progression across different feature branches

file_insights.changes: Updated path references from 017-1-2-create-equipmentapprovalsubmission-model task to 049-create-consultant-assignment-ui task for Read, Write, Edit, Glob, and Grep permissions
file_insights.significance: High - enables tool access for new task context and working directory

patterns_discovered.description: Project uses structured specs with numbered IDs (017, 049) to track features and tasks, with associated subtasks and progress tracking
patterns_discovered.evidence: .auto-claude-status tracks spec, subtasks completion metrics, phases, and session state

patterns_discovered.description: Each task has isolated worktree and settings with distinct paths, allowing parallel or sequential work on different features
patterns_discovered.evidence: Settings updated to switch from one task worktree to another with complete path isolation

patterns_discovered.description: Project organized into phases (Testing and Verification → Integration and Data Flow), suggesting structured SDLC
patterns_discovered.evidence: Phase progression tracked in status file, total 4 phases in current spec

gotchas_discovered.description: Multiple hardcoded paths in settings require manual synchronization when switching between tasks
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Use templated or dynamic path resolution in configuration management

gotchas_discovered.description: Session number increment (8→13) and task switching suggests potential context loss if not properly managed
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure session state persists correctly and is properly restored when switching between specs

approach_outcome.description: Successfully completed subtask-4-2 to integrate API calls in AssignmentCalendar with fetch and date range filtering capability
key_achievements: Spec progressed from 017 to 049 (consultant assignment UI)
Phase advanced to Integration and Data Flow
Completed 12 of 15 subtasks with 1 in progress
approach_outcome.verification: Marked as VERIFIED in commit message, indicating successful testing and validation

recommendations.recommendation: Implement dynamic path templating in .claude_settings.json to reduce manual updates when switching between task contexts
Document the spec switching workflow (017→049) to ensure consistent task context management across sessions
Monitor the 3 remaining subtasks (15 total - 12 completed) for potential blockers as they enter development phase
Implement comprehensive test coverage for edge cases in date range filtering (boundary dates, timezone handling, null cases)
